svcproc.title: PRO SLEEPER TRAILER CONNECTOR
svcproc.para: Refer to the circuit diagram on , for the sleeper trailer socket wiring. The trailer socket system includes switched accessory power to the Orange terminal of trailer socket (112). With the key ON (or ACC position) accessory power from 15A fuse F10-A is applied to trailer auxiliary switch (418) terminal 5. With this switch ON power from terminal 6 is applied through the cab and sleeper harness to the trailer socket orange terminal. Power also goes from terminal 5 through terminal 3 to an LED which is grounded from terminal 1. The LED turns ON whenever the switch is ON. The switch contains a second LED that is turned ON whenever the panel lights are ON, illuminating the switch label. This LED receives power at terminal 7 and grounds through panel light ground adapter (506).
